messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: Too hot, too cold was Night wetting /Julie S....
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 05/01/2004 03:56:24 Pacific Standard Time, ... Bless you Deb, please add some more raspberry for me. We are at -32C, bloody cold and we are
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 05/01/2004 03:56:24 Pacific Standard Time,
ddzimlew@... writes:


> Deb L, making the raspberry noise in your general direction...
>

Bless you Deb, please add some more raspberry for me. We are at -32C, bloody
cold and we are also staying in. I look forward to playing with my kids all
day if I want, and will be making some Monkey Buns. Yum!!!!
Nancy in BC, flippin' cold.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
